ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Other than the chosen creatures of God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: except for the chosen servants of Allah?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Only Our sincere servants were saved.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Except the chosen bondmen of Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Except the chosen servants of Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Except the servants of Allah, the purified ones.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Not so the chosen servants of God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Save the bondmen of Allah sincere.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Except the sincere (and devoted) Servants of Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Except the chosen slaves of Allah (faithful, obedient, and true believers of Islamic Monotheism).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: except the sincere worshipers of Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Except for the sincere servants of God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: But not the chosen servants of Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:74] [all] except God’s sincere servants, namely, the believers, who are saved from chastisement because they were sincere in their worship (mukhlisīna); or (if one reads mukhlasīna) because God has made them sincerely devoted to such [worship].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Allah then made an exception, saying: (Save singled minded slaves of Allah) who are protected from disbelief and idolatry; and it is said that this means according to a variant reading: except those chosen for worship and the profession of Allah's divine Oneness. The latter did not disbelieve and therefore We did not destroy them.
